name: Frozen Bow[3]
description: The bow whose body is frosted. I wonder if you can use it.

name: Frozen Heart
description: Hard and frozen heart. Very cold so please mind your hands.

name: Frozen Rose
description: This was carved out of ice by a well-known sculptor who lived in a cold place. It makes for an exotic gift, especially since it is a rare material used for making accessories.

name: Frozen Rose Ring
description: The crystal ring has a rose pattern. Maybe it's an emblem of a big family?
effect: Atk ＋30,The wearer will not be actively attacked by plant monsters

name: Frozen Rose Ring [1]
description: The crystal ring has a rose pattern. Maybe it's an emblem of a big family?
effect: Atk ＋30,The wearer will not be actively attacked by plant monsters

name: Frozen Seal
description: I'm looking for a penguin that's running about. Have you seen it? [Designed by Sun Lee]The little sea says with its tongue hanging out, gasping for air.

name: Full Atk of Praying
description: After use, the Atk of guild praying will reach the threshold

name: Full Def of Praying
description: After use, the Def of guild praying will reach the threshold

name: Full M.Atk of Praying
description: After use, the M.Atk of guild praying will reach the threshold

name: Full M.Def of Praying
description: After use, the M.Def of guild praying will reach the threshold

name: Full Max HP of Praying
description: After use, the Max HP of guild praying will reach the threshold

name: Fullblack Dagger [1]
description: A Katars that has no shadow in any light.

name: Fullblack Dagger [2]
description: A Katars that has no shadow in any light.

name: Fusion Staff
description: It'll be so cool to fuse technology with magic!

name: Future Mirror
description: "When you look at the future, the future looks back at you."

name: Ga Ga Ga!
description: This super cool Rocker Band will drive boredom out of your quiet life. Bring them with you all the time! (Use it to summon a Rocker Band)
